thread.section_title: Shelburne NYC-an Affinia hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great
thread.title_full: Great - Review of Shelburne NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: saric938
title: Great
text: This hotel is perfect- perfect location, perfect sized rooms, perfect fridge and microwave. It was perfect for our trip. The staff is friendly and very helpful. We left our luggage with the bellman for the day. The front desk staff was helpful with directions and a map. It is walking distance from grand central station, which will take you anywhere you need to go. It is near shopping and the Empire State Building.
